Detail: Cuts & Scrapes Protocol

Clean the wound gently with soap and water. Apply a sterile dressing. Seek professional medical attention for deep or profusely bleeding cuts.

Detail: Burns Treatment

Immediately cool the burn under running cool water for 10-20 minutes. Do not use ice. Cover with cling film or a sterile dressing. Severe burns require immediate emergency care.

Government Schemes

1.AYUSHMAN BHARAT:- Offers free and universal services to all individuals within their service area
2.Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana :- PROVIDES A HEALTH COVER OF UP TO
5L/- per family per year for secondary and tertiary care.

3.Ayushman Vay Vandana:- Provides benefits to all senior citizens aged 70 and above
regardless of their income

4.Rashtriya Arogya Nidhi:- Scheme offering financial assistance to Below Poverty Line families
for treatmentr of life-threatening diseases under brograms like Health Ministers Cancer Patient Fund

5.Janashadi Kendras:- established to make quality generic medicines and reliable implants
available at discounted prices,
including those for cardiovascular diseases, cancer and diabetes

6. immunisation programs:- A Nation wide vaccination Program to protect
children against serious, life threatning diseases

7.SAANS :- Works to reduce child mortality and morbidity due to Pneumonia
